customConfig.name: pagePrefetching
customConfig.label: Page prefetching
customConfig.note: Speeds-up page-loads after the initial load by prefetching in-viewport links during idle time. When enabled, it will check the current browser window for any links, then, if the browser isn't doing anything and the user isn't on a slow connection, it will start pre-loading the linked URLs so that the content will be ready when the link is clicked.

customConfig.name: lazyLoadEffect

customConfig.note: This option works only if the 'Media lazy load' option is enabled in the Website Speed tab under Site Settings
